## FieldDataPath interface

Denotes the path to the field data on the Result's raw dadta.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FieldDataPath 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [apiName](./answers-react-components.fielddatapath.apiname.md) | string \| string\[\] | The api name which denotes the path to the field data. |
|  [mappingType](./answers-react-components.fielddatapath.mappingtype.md) | 'FIELD' | Indicates that the field data is mapped from the Result's raw data |
